content: this legal text summarizes a civil case that has been ongoing for four years the court has made a final ruling declaring the succession of the deceased individuals and determining the distribution of their estate the court has divided the estate among the heirs with specific percentages allocated to each individual however certain assets cannot be divided so the court has ordered the dissolution of the hereditary community and the auction sale of the property the court has also ordered the reimbursement of inheritance expenses and the payment of civil fruits to the heirs one party made a claim of simulation but the court rejected it the court has declared that the costs of the litigation will be fully offset among the sharers the court has provided the legal principles that were applied in making the decision the ruling was made in palermo on june 18 2019
